title: test_ingest_endpoint_process_raw_telco_data
description: Verify that the /ingest POST endpoint correctly processes raw Telco customer churn CSV data, cleans data types, converts Yes/No columns to binary, creates engagement signals, and saves the cleaned data successfully.

title: test_engineer_endpoint_feature_engineering_and_split
description: Verify that the /engineer POST endpoint performs one-hot encoding of categorical variables, selects features appropriately, prepares train/test splits, and saves the engineered features successfully.

title: test_train_endpoint_model_training_and_saving
description: Verify that the /train POST endpoint trains Logistic Regression and Random Forest models on the prepared data, evaluates their performance using ROC-AUC and PR-AUC metrics, selects the best performing model, and saves it successfully.
